Why was Amber taping him all the time, if not wanting to set him up the entire time?
She was taping him before they were even married.
author: lisa richards

comment: I really don't know what to make out of all of this for it goes way too deep in the back of a closet in other people's lives.  But I am curious about one thing and that's how was this recording obtained?
author: The Bastard Gift
